Grab too frequently: You can only grab ONE envelope every 30 mins
Move too fast: Seems you have moved a long distance in a short period, cannot grab envelopes now
Envelope is busy: The envelope is busy. Try again later.
Still Within Reserved Interval: New envelopes cannot be recalled within the first 24 hours
rulerInstruction: Radius of the circle is {radius} km

welcomeEnvelope.title: Click to grab BTC
welcomeEnvelope.content: Try this envelope. You'll get {amount} BTC after a single click.

fail2locate.basic: Cannot find your location. Please check System Settings.

fail2locate.placeNewEnvelope: To place a new envelope, we have to use your location
fail2locate.activelyLocate: Cannot find your location. Please retry.

locationMarker:people: The people image represents your location

newEnvelope.introduceFAB: Click '+' at the right bottom to create a new envelope
newEnvelope.distanceLimit: Your new envelope can be placed within {radius} km from here
newEnvelope.guideEdit: Drag to move, or start to edit its content

coinAmount.label: Total Amount
coinAmount.msg: How many {coin} in this envelope. Minimum: {min}.
coinAmount.decimalPlaces: Decimal places shouldn't be greater than {places}

peopleCount.msg: How many people can grab a share?

displayInfo.label: Display
displayInfo.basicOpt: Basic Info: Mixin ID, Name, Avatar

newEnvelope.success: Yeah! Your envelope will appear on the map soon

created.recalling: Recalling. Result will be sent to you later.

transparency.content0: The envelopes you created，are managed by a proxy account. Reading the account, you will find all underlying transactions.
transparency.content1: If you need to access those information，click + signs to get tokens for Mixin APIs. Refer Mixin Developer Document for how to use the tokens.
transparency.content2: Besides, tokens are valid in 90 days; do not use URL parameters in the snapshots API.

firstGuide.title: You get it
firstGuide.guide: You can look for other BTC near your city. So, locate yourself on the map.
firstGuide.located: Going to your city. Zoom and move the map to find envelopes.
firstGuide.locationFailed: Cannot find your location. You can still search envelopes, but not grab them.
